endpoints.summary: Revoke the current API token, ensuring that no further requests can    be made using it.

params.name: api_key
params.desc: The API key that identifies the consumer you wish to authenticate.

params.name: api_secret
params.desc: The API secret for the consumer identified by that key.

endpoints.summary: Authenticate using an API key and secret, returning an API token    that may be used in subsequent API calls.

params.name: handle
params.desc: The handle this user will go by.

params.name: email
params.desc: The email of the new user.

params.name: password_md5
params.desc: An MD5 hash of the desired password.
